page.title: 06NOTABLE BUILDINGS (1)
page.content: { LANTEGLOS CHURCH The church has services 3 times a month.The Saint that the church is dedicated to is Julietta.The church is about 1,000 years .At every service there is a collection for the upkeep of the church.The church wardens and the server take the collection. CAMELFORD C.P. SCHOOL. Our school was built in 1916.We have over 300 pupils and about 30 in each class .We have 11 classes and also a new hall.We have 2 classes for children with special needs and a Nursery class.School dinners are 65pence a day.Wehave a secretary,11 teachers and a headmaster.The children are aged between 3 and 11.
